Install solar panels on the roof of your home to generate electricity and power a portable air conditioner or fan.
Use natural ventilation by opening windows and doors to allow fresh air to circulate in your home.
Install a radiant heating system, such as underfloor heating, to maintain a consistent temperature throughout your home.
Use a humidifier to increase the moisture in the air, which can help regulate temperature and improve indoor air quality.
Use a space heater to heat up specific areas of your home, such as your bedroom or living room, instead of relying on central heating or air conditioning.
